EmailTemplate.name: Pinterest Survey- 1226.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: We want your feedback on Pinterest Buyable Pins
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We hope you are enjoying the Pinterest Buyable Pins integration. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for recently trying out Bigcommerce’s integration with Pinterest Buyable Pins. To help us continue to improve our service, we’d like to ask you a few short questions about your experience. This survey should take less than 5 minutes to complete.
TAKE THE SURVEY <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/QVYNF6K]]> Thanks,
The BigCommerce Team
